required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of Effectiveness and Safety of Dietary Supplement Potensa in Men With Erectile Dysfunction
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Evaluation of Effectiveness and Safety of Dietary Supplement Potensa in Men With Erectile Dysfunction

brief_summary.textblock: This is a randomized, double blind, placebo-controlled, comparative, prospective study (clinical evaluation) of the effectiveness and safety of dietary supplement Potensa in men with mild to moderate erectile dysfunction.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in the International Index of Erectile Function (IIEF) score
primary_outcome.description: Self reported erectile function; higher score indicates less dysfunction

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in the International Index of Erectile Function (IIEF) score
primary_outcome.description: Self reported erectile function; higher score indicates less dysfunction

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in the International Index of Erectile Function (IIEF) score
primary_outcome.description: Self reported erectile function; higher score indicates less dysfunction

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in the Aging Male Symptome Scale (AMS) score
primary_outcome.description: Self reported symptoms; lower score indicates fewer/lesser symptoms

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in the Aging Male Symptome Scale (AMS) score
primary_outcome.description: Self reported symptoms; lower score indicates fewer/lesser symptoms

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in the Aging Male Symptome Scale (AMS) score
primary_outcome.description: Self reported symptoms; lower score indicates fewer/lesser symptoms

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in the Spielberger-Hanin anxiety test
primary_outcome.description: Self-administered questionnaire; higher score indicates more anxiety

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in the Spielberger-Hanin anxiety test
primary_outcome.description: Self-administered questionnaire; higher score indicates more anxiety

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in the Spielberger-Hanin anxiety test
primary_outcome.description: Self-administered questionnaire; higher score indicates more anxiety

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in testosterone levels
Change from baseline in testosterone levels

Change from baseline in follicle stimulating hormone (FSH) levels

secondary_outcome.description: Based on the results of Spielberger-Hanin anxiety test (score).
Based on the results of International Index of Erectile Function (IIEF) test (score)
Based on the results of Aging Male Symptoms (AMS) test (score)

secondary_outcome.measure: Positive dynamics of the primary endpoints
secondary_outcome.description: Percent of patients corresponding to the primary endpoints with positive dynamics

intervention.description: Potensa - a dietary supplement: 4 capsules (2 white 200mg each and 2 blue 200 mg each) once a day with a meal or immediately after a meal, preferably after breakfast, for 3 months.
Placebo: 4 capsules (2 white 200mg each and 2 blue 200 mg each) once a day with a meal or immediately after a meal, preferably after breakfast, for 3 months.

overall_official.affiliation: N.A. Lopatkin Urology and Interventional Radiology Research Center
